sections.heading: is a violation of the Employee Classification Act for a contractor to designate an individual as an independent contractor who would be properly classified as an employee under section 48-2903

sections.text:
48-2904.Violation.

It is a violation of the Employee Classification Act for a contractor to designate an individual as an independent contractor who would be properly classified as an employee under section 48-2903.

SourceLaws 2010, LB563, ยง 4.
